name: CountryQuizzBizz
0:
”Alexa open quiz game”
”Alexa ask quiz game to start a quiz”
”Alexa ask quiz game to tell me about countryname”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz game
des: A simple quiz game and info guide on all the countries of the world. It can either provide information such as countries' capital, continent, currency and language spoken for a particular country or any capital or you can test your knowledge by taking up a small quiz challenge. How it work? Well, it's simple. ask Country Quizz Bizz to start a quiz game and the it will ask you for actions that you wanna perform. If you want to play a game then you can say start a quiz and then it will ask you 10 questions regarding various countries of the world. Or you can ask any information regarding any particular country and it will answer accordingly. to quit you can say "cancel"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
